entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement drawing API #106373
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'unreached' during `Importation` #106372
    9.0.0
  • System.Threading.ThreadPool.Tests fail in CI with System.Net.Sockets.SocketException #106371
  • Using Options Validation Source Generator results in increased app size #106366
    Future
  • [ARM64] Post-indexed addressing mode does not work on spans #106365
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38167 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #106359
  • JIT: Wrong encoding for embedded broadcast #106355
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with ulong -> float conversion on arm64 #106338
    9.0.0
  • Tracking: Add Azure Linux for build and test #106331
  • WebClient() Removal Timeline #106325
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests.HPack.HuffmanDecodingTests.HuffmanDecoding_ValidEncoding_Succeeds on WASM #106323
  • Httpclient throwing Response ended Prematurely #106322
  • System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution "crash" on tvOS #106319
  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #106342
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Cache #106346
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions on Multiple platforms, 8/8/2024 11:52:00 PM #106345
  • Mono Runtime crash when debug evaluating/inspecting/monitor member #106311
    9.0.0
  • Wasm export functions with name space cannot be invoked correctly? #106310
  • The .NET 8 executable behaves differently from the .NET 6 executable on Linux. #106306

Closed

  • ARM-SVE: AddSequentialAcross() is defined incorrectly #106180
    9.0.0
  • Unify type name parser in linker once is in runtime #77868
    9.0.0
  • Documentation status of _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88805
    9.0.0
  • Compiling against methods that accept params span with only System.Runtime reference produces compiler error #102513
    9.0.0
  • Installation of .NET 8.0+ disables mouse #103343
  • Applications requesting download of .NET 8 runtime even when it is installed #105615
  • CI failure RegularExpressions didn't throw expected TimeoutException #106096
    9.0.0
  • Build FAILED after #106209 PR (Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer) #106321
  • SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #104732
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] EventSource_SendingRequest_PathAndQueryRedaction_LogsStartStop #106268
  • Calling a CsWinRT NAOT dll's DllCanUnloadNow export triggers CFG failure #105330
    9.0.0
  • TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer failed in CI #103459
    9.0.0
  • Host Feature request: Enable FDD apps to always get the globally installed runtime #86801
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38168 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #106361
  • ILVerify complains about conversion from `string[]` to `IList<object>` #106282
  • System.Linq.Expressions almost completely lacks support for ByRef values #84173
  • Performance issue occurs while using DynamicInvoke #88469
  • FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION: System.InvalidOperationException: JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled in .NET for Android #106339
  • `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.WorkItemExecution` fails with access violation #105704
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #100051
    9.0.0
  • Expression.Lambda() performance degradation and system outage with over 16 arguments #97466
  • EnsureInitialized test crash on llvm19/iOS #105251
    9.0.0
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Logging] Bug: Logging arrays is broken and behaves unreliably #103338
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) && "ERROR: Did not morph this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #106278
    9.0.0
  • FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION: System.InvalidOperationException: JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled in .NET for Android #106315
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSE41)' #106143
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!foundMismatch' during 'LSRA allocate' #66580
    9.0.0
  • Double check failing `allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema` EE calls #101711
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: ConditionalSelect(LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtend*) codegen #102904
    9.0.0
  • Swedish characters bug in terminal with .Net 7 #92009
    9.0.0
  • [mono] macOS interpreter failure in GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950/452950/452950.sh #105933
  • Please introduce pauseless GC in c# #49059
    Future
  • [browser][MT] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.WorkItemExecution timeout #102385
    9.0.0
  • Reading JsonNode Property Throws 'Nullable object must have a value' on first access #106298
  • [Test Failure] iOS.Device.ExportManagedSymbols times out #106318
  • [NativeAOT] string[] not assignable to IList<object> #106297
  • [wasi] Native link produces `dotnet.wasm` in project folder and then it copies it to output folder #100863
    9.0.0
  • .net 8 Blazor WASM project AOT fails #99548
    9.0.0
  • CI test failure: Connection handshake was canceled due to the configured timeout #99074
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Intrinsics/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro.cmd #106244
  • Test failure: GC/API/GC/GetTotalAllocatedBytes/GetTotalAllocatedBytes.sh #106305
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/xxobj/sizeof/sizeof32_Target_64Bit_and_arm_d/sizeof32_Target_64Bit_and_arm_d.cmd #106307
  • Is there a way to modify the file properties of the exe generated after .NET compilation? #106127
  • iOS, .NET 9 Preview 7, AOT compiler failure #106137
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests test failure #103525
    9.0.0
  • P99 Latency for .net 8 services increased > 10x #101746
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 2 Regressions on 12/5/2023 8:53:15 AM #96499
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fixes #106142. #106369
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add NegotiatedCipherSuite to QuicConnection #106368
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.x
  • Fix issue 105966. #106364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump Windows MsQuic version to 2.4.3 #106363
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add missing delegating/override method in TlsStream #106362
    area-System.Net
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileName in cDAC #106358
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix evaluate method in a struct that doesn't need extra_space #106351
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Enable `ConditionalSelect_FalseOp` scenario for first-faulting tests #106349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Flight new nuget code in a new SDK #106348
    needs-area-label
  • add PACKAGE.md for System.Formats.Nrbf #106344
    documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0

    area-codeflow

    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add DiagnosticSource to CheckNonEventSourcesRunning #106337
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add more images to table #106336
    needs-area-label
  • Skip deeply-recursive test in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` if doing random OSR #106335
    needs-area-label
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Update to Preview7 SDK #106333
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a couple commutative flags to be correct #106332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [.NET 10] Use ProjectReferences in libs #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM-SVE: Add LD/ST info to SVE instructions #105512 #106328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update packaging.targets #106327
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable HuffmanDecoding_ValidEncoding_Succeeds on Browser #106326
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests package readme #106317
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix: SafeBerHandle and HGlobalMemHandle leaks in BerConverter #106316
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Sign/zero-extend small primitive arguments for pinvokes on arm32 and Apple arm64 #106314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Sign/zero-extend small primitive arguments on arm32 and Apple arm64 #106312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Modify dwarfReg in native llvm-libunwind to be consistent with the LoongArch manual. #106308
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add FreeBSD as valid test host. #106302
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • ARM64-SVE: Emit `AddSequentialAcross` correctly #106292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package readme #106273
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Push MemoryMarshal down to System.Runtime #106360

    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0

    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix alignment of local vars #106313

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

    area-Meta
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125

  • [LoongArch64] add `DelayLoadHelperWithExistingIndirectionCell`. #106304

    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [HttpClientFactory] Don't log header values by default #106271
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Replace absolute labels with #define in assembly code #106225

  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix passing targetRID into sourcebuild job #106285
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][llvm] Fix handling of compare when last instruction in bblock #106233
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Simplify MethodDesc::GetLoaderModule #106212
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
